title.label: Malfunctions by not awarding tokens earned

content.label: The APP does not award the tokens earned consistently. I‚Äôve earned 25,000, 10,000, 7,500 or as little as 1,000 tokens, and the app will say I‚Äôve earned ZERO.  Thereafter, it‚Äôll say the server is down, and so I‚Äôll close the APP.  I‚Äôll return later to see that I lost the tokens earned plus the 10,000 bonus tokens.  It‚Äôll just advance to the next envelope. This happens several times while trying to complete all levels. It happens so much, that I‚Äôll end up giving up after the 4th, 5th or 6th time the APP malfunctions.  It‚Äôs extremely aggravating, especially when I‚Äôm doing well by consistently earning 25,000 tokens (+10k bonus) at each level. This happens every single day. According to the numbers, there‚Äôs no way to earn ZERO tokens. This needs to be fixed, and I hope it‚Äôll be fixed soon. Thank you.
